title: Billionaire's Captive: Complete Trilogy
description: Librarian Note: Older cover of B08P5NCCC9.I’m going to teach you, sweetness." I watch as her chest rises and falls rapidly at my words."How to give yourself fully to me.”Her gaze doesn’t leave mine as she stutters, “I- I don’t know if I can do that.”“You don’t have to do a thing.” I can’t stop myself from reaching out and touching her hair. My hand is huge by her face. I grip one of her damp locks, swallowing it in my fist. “Just let go and be mine.”Years ago Daphne's father stole from me and it’s time for my revenge. She never saw me coming, but her past, her present, and her future have always been mine.It's time for her to finally learn just how delicious surrender can be.From USA Today Bestselling Authors Stasia Black and Lee Savino comes a stormy saga of passion, revenge, and surrender in this complete three-book dark romance trilogy.**Books in this completed Dark Romance Trilogy Boxset include:Beauty’s BeastBeauty & the ThornsBeauty & the Rose
author: Lee Savino
